thread.title: Atlanta police shoot robbery suspect near Magic City strip club
thread.title_full: Atlanta police shoot robbery suspect near Magic City strip club | www.ajc.com

author: Eric Stirgus
title: Atlanta police shoot robbery suspect near Magic City strip club
text:
Atlanta police shot a suspect Saturday night who was fleeing from a strip club where a robbery had been reported.
The incident occurred at about 8:30 p.m., Channel 2 Action News reported. An officer was on patrol in the parking lot of Magic City, located on Forsyth Street in downtown Atlanta, when someone approached the officer about a possible theft that had just occurred, Atlanta police said in a statement.
During the investigation, the officer shot at a white sport-utility vehicle. The SUV fled the scene, but hit a vehicle a few blocks away at Spring and Mitchell streets.
A robbery suspect was shot in the leg Saturday morning after fleeing a robbery scene outside Magic City. (Credit: Channel 2 Action News) One of the passengers in the SUV was shot in the leg, police said. The passenger was taken to Grady Memorial Hospital where police said he is in stable condition.
Channel 2 reported two men were arrested at the scene. Their names were not released.
